latest_doc_d.description: Palamandadige Rose Kumari Nishanthi Fernando and Others Vs Hon. S. M. Chandrasena, Minister of Lands and Others before Hon. S.U.B. Karalliyadde, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Palamandadige Rose Kumari Nishanthi Fernando and Others Vs Hon. S. M. Chandrasena, Minister of Lands and Others
latest_doc_d.keywords: Acquisition of land under the Land Acquisition Act, Section 2, 5, 7(1), 44 and 39A of the Land Acquisition Act, Writ of Mandamus, divesting order, misrepresentation of facts, clean hands, delay
latest_doc_d.legistation: The State Lands (Recovery of Possession) Act, No. 7 of 1977 (as amended), Land Acquisition Act, No. 09 of 1950 (as amended) and the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
